remarks: A theorem which could be used as sole axiom for the non-logical predicate instead of ~ ax-8 and ~ ax-9 .  Indeed, it is implied over propositional calculus by the conjunction of ~ ax-8 and ~ ax-9 , as proved here.  In the other direction, one can prove ~ ax-8 (respectively ~ ax-9 ) from ~ bj-ax89 by using ~ mpan2 ( respectively ~ mpan ) and ~ equid .  (TODO: move to main part.)  (Contributed by BJ, 3-Oct-2019.)
